column4: When im in "[!!]  Install the GRUB boot loader on a hard disk" and i can write hd(1,0) should i write "(hd6,0)" or only (hd6,0) ?
but is there noway to boot my ubuntu on my hard disk, by using my ubuntu cd?
am i needet to reinstall my ubuntu again then?
you could boot off a cd and reinstall grub
